changes: Bedrock is now breakable| New controls system! You can now double tap to fly| Graphics have been overhauled, there are now 3d items in the world and in the inventory, and awesome new player animations
Updated the infrastructure to leverage AWS Global Accelerator reducing latency| Dockerized the servers to streamline the development process
Updated stats info| Added ability to shift click for inventory management

Added armor| Added middle click to select blocks while in creative mode| Added the Alex skin which can be selected in the start menu| Added dynamic FOV while drawing bow| Added /save command| Updated the stats GUI| Added spawnable bots| Added debug GUI to view chunk boundaries and entity bounding boxes| Explosions now delete entities and damage players within range| Cleaned up a lot of code

Added /ban and /unban commands| Added several more blocks| Added a Discord server link for developmental progress| Added drowning in survival mode| Added leaves specific for each tree| Updated arrow mesh when fired| Updated health bar animations after regeneration or taking damage| Fixed issues where trees would re-generate after the server is restarted| Game shows a disconnect timer after the server is restarted

Added enderpearls and fireballs to the game| Added shapeless and mirrored crafting recipes| Updated inventory management to allow for drag clicking| Fixed bug that caused trees to regrow after the server is restarted

Added crafting table menu along with several new recipes| Added several new blocks and items| Added search bar and scrollbar to creative mode inventory| Disabled image smoothing for sharper item icons| Fixed bug where players do not show death screen when in creative mode

Added /leave /op /deop /kill /kick /spawnpoint /sethome /home /msg /reply and /list commands| Added several new blocks| Added nametag colors specific to each gamemode| Usernames must now be alphabetical| Fixed issue where players shared texture materials

Added a chat profanity filter| Added /give /setblock /clear and /reload commands| Added god mode| Added stars rotation to the background| Added ability to teleport relative to the player by using ~| Added server region names, ping and uptime indicators on the server list| Optimized raycaster function to only check meshes within a certain distance| Optimized chunk generation on the server| Updated player models for spectators

Massively optimized chunk generation by using SharedArrayBuffers in web workers| Added ability to change material texture to improve performance| Added FOV slider in video settings| Fixed teleporting to players and added ability to teleport to coordinates (usage: /tp <int> <int> <int>)

Reduced file sizes of world saves by 70% by removing chunks that have not been changed| Game now removes players and server entities after disconnection| Chat is now reset after disconnection| Offloaded chunk generation on the server using worker threads| Added a disconnection progress bar| Added multiple regional servers (eu-west, ap-south, ap-southeast)
Added spectator and camera gamemodes. Use /gamemode spectator or /gamemode camera| Added button to disconnect from servers
Updated menu UI| Added the ability to join servers from different regions| Added server logging| Added CORS support for servers| Increased the accuracy of shadows| Fixed empty chunks bug

Players now spawn on the ground if possible| Added CORS support| Fixed crosshair jerk due to a Chrome bug| Fixed z-fighting issue with transparent blocks/items| Fixed players join with a default name| Optimized chunk loading by reducing the latency of web workers
Added creative mode| Added commands such as /tp and /gamemode
Added multiple new blocks| Improved terrain generation| Simplified texture loading process

Added a versions tab to the start menu to see previous versions| Added multiplayer hand models| Added blocking functionality to the sword to reduce incoming damage and knockback| Added bunny hopping| Fixed blocks being able to be placed on water| Added cobblestone, sand, gravel, and obsidian blocks

Fixed players being able to punch through walls| Improved start menu UI| Added start menu loading bar| World save messages no longer clog up the chat| Added the ability to reassign controls| Added cookies so video and keyboard settings can be saved
Added stars| Improved night time lighting| Optimized texture atlas generation| Player arm now switches to the selected block| Added a sword| Added a tab so players are able to see who is online
Improved swimming mechanics| Items now snap to player instead of gravitate| Worlds are able to be saved now

Breaking blocks and placing blocks on chunk boundaries only update those chunks which are affected| Added the moon| Smoothed out day-night transition| Fixed diagonal collision resolution| Fixed crouch building
Players can take fall damage| Optimized chunk loading using web workers
Added water to terrain generation
Added a day night cycle
Added an inventory system with basic crafting abilities
Added ore generation| Added player knockback in multiplayer PvP
Added the ability to drop and collect items| Items despawn after 30 seconds if dropped
Added items with the ability to select items from the toolbar| Added fog
Added block breaking animation| Added trees
Added support for serverside chunk loading
Added automatic chunk loading and unloading
Added support for multiple chunks with unique textures
Added chat messaging
Added player health and regeneration| Added multiplayer PvP
Added nametags to players
Added steve skin| Added walking and punching animation to players
Added the basic skeletal structure for players
Added multiplayer world synchronization| Interpolated player movement
Added basic terrain generation| Add multiplayer support for players
